title: Tyke
author: Tyke
content: There are only about 4 months until the 'The Bitcoin History Book 2008-2024' is self-published on Amazon (12th September 2024) as a hardcover, paperback and ebook.  I am fairly confident that I have ample resources and time to meet this personal deadline, but it feels like it is becoming more of a challenge as the weeks go by.  I have completed pages covering 2008-2019, nearly completed 2020, and have yet to spend sufficient time on 2021, 2022, 2023 and Jan-Jun 2024.  Original Bitcointalk thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5475400.0Here is a preview showing chapters 2008 to 2016 (originally posted on 31/03/2024 for the community to read):https://drive.google.com/file/d/1M8z4M4oV4WC_aIGWkn-tO_T7Nkllj47C/view?usp=sharingI am wholeheartedly determined to complete the book on time without sacrificing quality and content.  If you can, please donate to the book:$BTC bc1qktyzg2atx5paka2x64pxdwg54u7m2yn3cu2qxy$LTC ltc1qz8jqkhy264q3mdjkjzsve7er25qdnmmvxt96lr$ETH 0x125288bAf499e26259f8E2aC6FC5fE1491aBa9c2$DOGE DRj7PWEz5zxHc5ptkTBapKjCrxQU75CB6q$XRP r9LbXGJ9HCdwvAhKWJJLihSd8612xHybv7Anyone who donates at least US$10 will have their name/alias in the book (please dm me if you do). Just over 10 already have their name listed! I look forward to support from the community who can help give me ample time to complete the 300 page A4 colour interior book.  As far as I know, nothing similar to this has been put together, and I feel it will be a great resource for newbies and OGs alike.
